short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The latest AB Tasty extension for Google Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AB Tasty is an all-in-one optimization platform. Our Chrome extension allows you to easily create and manage your tests, personalizations and user engagement campaigns straight from your browser. You can also gain quick access to some utilities that help you ease the process of setting up your campaigns, such as updating the AB Tasty script, deleting cookies, spotting live campaigns on specific pages...
